Content: One way to realize buildings increasing their output with population
size would be passive workers. Passive workers would be the entire
population and they would not be taken from the population pool. (So a
univerities output may be increased if there are a lot of potential
canidates even if it just uses a tiny fraction as (active) workers.
Another example would be a computer system using the unconcious mind of
the population or a sapling collector for a plant-like species).
